channel.title: Pk doesnt drop items?
channel.description:
me and my friends was testing pk and found out when killed it doesnt drop items, instead it gives you pk point.
How would i make it so it drop the items? because only pk points would be a fucked up pk system....

item.title: Pk doesnt drop items?
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

I could only assume that Hybrid Pvp is a project insanity source.

If you guys are administrators on the server, there’s a good chance you have the ADMIN_CAN_DROP boolean set to true, preventing you guys from dropping. Go to the config class (config.java) and turn the boolean to false.

Read full topic

item.title: Pk doesnt drop items?
item.dc:creator: @yesimanub yesimanub
item.description:
@yesimanub wrote:

[quote=“i am infamy, post:2, topic:448108”][quote author=yesimanub link=topic=551002.msg4038200#msg4038200 date=1341370098]
me and my friends was testing pk and found out when killed it doesnt drop items, instead it gives you pk point.

How would i make it so it drop the items? because only pk points would be a fucked up pk system…
[/quote]

where you and your friend staff by any chance… [/quote]

we tested out all pk zones, and we are using hybrid pvp v3

Read full topic
